Oh! You do smell good.
Alice, what are you--
It's okay. Bella and I are gonna be great friends.
translation.fr: - Alice... - Ne t'en fais pas. Bella et moi serons de grandes amies.

translation.en: [Carlisle] Sorry, Jasper's our newest vegetarian. It's a little difficult for him.
translation.fr: Jasper est végétarien depuis peu. Il a un peu de mal.

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you.
It's okay, Jasper. You won't hurt her.
translation.fr: C'est bon, Jasper. Tu ne lui feras rien.

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna take you on a tour of the rest of the house.
translation.fr: Je te fais visiter la maison.

translation.en: Well, I'll see you soon.
-Cute! -I know.
I think that went well.
Clean this up. Now.
Was that as weird for you as it was for me?
Uh, I don't know.
Graduation caps?
Yeah. It's a private joke. We matriculate a lot.
translation.fr: C'est une blague entre nous. On s'inscrit partout.

translation.en: That's kind of miserable.
I mean, repeating high school over and over.
translation.fr: de redoubler sans arrêt, au lycée.

translation.en: True, but the younger we start out in a new place, the longer we can stay there.
translation.fr: Plus on arrive jeune, plus on peut rester longtemps.

translation.en: Come on.
Yeah, this is my room.
No bed?
I don't sleep.
Ever?
No, not at all.
Boy, you have so much music.
What are you listening to?
It's Debussy.
-I don't know... -Yeah.
Claire De Lune is great.
What?
I can't dance.
Well, I could always make you.
I'm not scared of you.
translation.fr: Tu ne me fais pas peur.

translation.en: Well, you really shouldn't have said that.
translation.fr: Tu as eu tort de dire ça.

translation.en: You better hold on tight, spider monkey.
Do you trust me?
In theory.
Then close your eyes.
What?
[chuckles] This isn't real. This kind of stuff just doesn't exist.
translation.fr: C'est irréel. Ça ne peut pas être vrai.

translation.en: It does in my world.
[man] Whoa. Hold up.
It's human.
Arizona. Yo, what's happening?
So you and Cullen, huh?
That's... I don't like it.
I mean, I don't know,
he just looks at you like you're something to eat.
translation.fr: Il te regarde comme s'il veut te manger.

translation.en: Here's your veggie plate, Stephenie.
Hey, sorry I'm late. Biology project.
translation.fr: Je suis en retard. Un exposé de biologie.

translation.en: I ordered you the spinach salad. I hope that's okay.
translation.fr: Je t'ai commandé la salade d'épinards. Ça ira ?

translation.en: You should order one for yourself next time. Cut back on the steak.
translation.fr: Prends-la, la prochaine fois. N'abuse pas du steak.

translation.en: Hey, I'm as healthy as a horse.
Say, Chief, boys want to know...
Did you find anything down by Queets River today?
translation.fr: s'il y a du nouveau, à Queets River ?

translation.en: Yeah, we found a bare human footprint,
but it looks like whoever that is is headed east
translation.fr: Mais l'inconnu se dirige vers l'est.

translation.en: so Kitsap County sheriff is gonna take over from here.
translation.fr: Le shérif de Kitsap prendra le relais.

translation.en: I just hope they catch him fast.
Looks like your friends are flagging you.
It's okay if you wanna go join them.
I'm just gonna turn in early anyway.
Me, too.
Bella, it's Friday night. Go out.
Looks like the Newton boy's got a big smile for you.
translation.fr: Le fils Newton t'a à la bonne.

translation.en: Yeah, he's a good buddy.
What about any of these other yahoos in town? Anybody interest you?
translation.fr: Et les autres zozos du coin ? Aucun ne t'intéresse ?

translation.en: Dad, we gonna talk about boys?
Yeah, I guess not.
I just feel like I leave you alone too much.
translation.fr: Mais... je te laisse trop seule. Vois du monde.

translation.en: You should be around people.
translation.fr: je te laisse trop seule. Vois du monde.

translation.en: I don't really mind being alone.
I guess I'm kind of like my dad in that way.
translation.fr: Je dois tenir de mon père.

translation.en: So, how's all the baseball stuff going?
Oh, Phil's working so hard.
You know, spring training.
We're looking for a house to rent in case things become more permanent.
translation.fr: On cherche une location, ça pourrait devenir permanent.

translation.en: You'd like Jacksonville, baby.
I'm really liking Forks.
Forks is growing on me.
Could a guy have anything to do with that?
Well, yeah.
I knew it. Tell me everything. What is he? Jock? Indie?
translation.fr: - Oui. - Je le savais. Raconte-moi tout. C'est un sportif ? Un artiste ?

translation.en: -I bet he's smart. Is he smart? -[gasps]
Mom, can I talk to you later?
Come on, we gotta talk boys. Are you being safe?
translation.fr: Faut en parler ! Tu te protèges ?

translation.en: How did you get in here?
The window.
Do you do that a lot?
Well, just the past couple of months.
I like watching you sleep.
It's kind of fascinating to me.
I always want to try one thing.
Just stay very still.
Don't move.
Stop it!
I'm sorry.
I'm stronger than I thought.
translation.fr: Je suis plus fort que je croyais.

translation.en: Yeah. I wish I could say the same.
I can't ever lose control with you.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas me laisser aller avec toi.

translation.en: Hey, don't go.
-Hey, got you another one. -Thanks.
I have a date with Edward Cullen.
He's a little old for you, isn't he?
translation.fr: Un peu vieux pour toi, non ?

translation.en: He's a junior. I'm a junior.
translation.fr: Il est en première. Moi aussi.

translation.en: I thought you liked the Cullens.
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu aimais les Cullen.

translation.en: I thought you didn't like any of the boys in town.
translation.fr: Je croyais que t'aimais pas les gars de la ville.

translation.en: Edward doesn't live in town.
Technically.
He's right outside.
He is?
Yeah, he wanted to meet you, officially.
All right. Bring him in.
Could you be nice? He's... he's important.
translation.fr: Tu peux être gentil ? Il compte pour moi.

translation.en: Chief Swan.
translation.fr: Chef Swan, j'aimerais me présenter dans les formes.

translation.en: I want to formally introduce myself. I'm Edward Cullen.
translation.fr: Chef Swan, j'aimerais me présenter dans les formes. Edward Cullen.

translation.en: Bella won't be out too late tonight. She's just gonna play baseball with my family.
translation.fr: Bella rentrera tôt. On va jouer au base-ball en famille.

translation.en: Baseball?
Yes, sir, that's the plan.
[chuckles] Bella's gonna play baseball.
Well, good luck with that.
I'll take good care of her. I promise.
Still got that pepper spray?
translation.fr: Tu as ton spray au poivre ?

translation.en: And since when do vampires like baseball?
translation.fr: Depuis quand les vampires aiment le base-ball ?

translation.en: Well, it's the American pastime
and there's a thunderstorm coming.
translation.fr: Et... on ne peut jouer qu'à l'approche d'un orage.

translation.en: It's the only time we can play. You'll see why.
translation.fr: Et... on ne peut jouer qu'à l'approche d'un orage. Tu verras pourquoi.

translation.en: Glad you're here. We need an umpire.
translation.fr: Bienvenue. Il nous faut une arbitre.

translation.en: She thinks we cheat.
I know you cheat.
Call them as you see them, Bella.
It's time.
Okay, now I see why you need the thunder.
That's gotta be a home run, right?
translation.fr: Ça va être un home run.

translation.en: Edward's very fast.
-You're out. -Out! Whoo!
Babe, come on. It's just a game.
Nice kitty.
My monkey man.
Stop!
They were leaving. Then they heard us.
translation.fr: Ils partaient, quand ils nous ont entendus.

translation.en: Let's go. It's too late.
Get your hair down.
Like that'll help. I could smell her from across the field.
translation.fr: Inutile, je la sens de l'autre bout du terrain.

translation.en: I shouldn't have brought you here. I'm so sorry.
translation.fr: - J'ai eu tort de te faire venir. - Qu'y a-t-il ?

translation.en: Just be quiet and stand behind me.
translation.fr: Ne dis rien, reste derrière moi.

translation.en: I believe this belongs to you.
translation.fr: Je crois que ceci vous appartient.

translation.en: Thank you.
I am Laurent. And this is Victoria...
translation.fr: Je suis Laurent. Je vous présente Victoria...

translation.en: and James.
I'm Carlisle. This is my family.
I'm afraid your hunting activities have caused something of a mess for us.
translation.fr: Vos activités de chasseurs nous valent des ennuis.

translation.en: Our apologies. We didn't realize the territory had been claimed.
translation.fr: Navrés. Nous ignorions que cette terre était privée.

translation.en: Yes, well, we maintain a permanent residence nearby.
translation.fr: Nous avons une résidence aux alentours.

translation.en: Really?
Well, we won't be a problem anymore.
We were just passing through.
The humans were tracking us, but we led them east. [whispering] You should be safe.
translation.fr: Les humains nous traquent à l'est. Vous ne risquez rien.

translation.en: Excellent.
So,
could you use three more players?
Oh, come on. Just one game.
Sure. Why not?
A few of us were leaving. You could take their place.
We'll bat first.
I'm the one with the wicked curveball.
Well, I think we can handle that.
We shall see.
You brought a snack.
[Laurent] A human?
[Carlisle] The girl is with us.
I think it best if you leave.
I can see the game is over.
We'll go now.
[Carlisle] Get Bella out of here.
Go.
Okay, I've got it! I've got it! I'm all right!
-What, now he's coming after me? -[engine starts]
Listen to me. James is a tracker.
The hunt is his obsession. I read his mind.
translation.fr: James est un traqueur obsessionnel. J'ai lu dans ses pensées. Ma réaction l'a enflammé.

translation.en: My reaction on the field set him off.
translation.fr: J'ai lu dans ses pensées. Ma réaction l'a enflammé.

translation.en: I just made this his most exciting game ever.
translation.fr: Par ma faute, tu deviens la traque de sa vie.

translation.en: -He's never gonna stop. -What should we do?
translation.fr: - Il n'arrêtera jamais. - On fait quoi ?

translation.en: We have to kill him. Rip him apart and burn the pieces.
translation.fr: Il faut le tuer, le dépecer et brûler les morceaux.

translation.en: -Where are we going? -Away from Forks. We'll get a ferry to Vancouver.
translation.fr: - Où on va ? - Loin. À Vancouver, en ferry.

translation.en: I have to go home. Now.
-You have to take me home. -You can't go home.
He's just gonna trace your scent there. It's the first place he's gonna look.
translation.fr: Ton odeur le guidera, il commencera par là.

translation.en: But my dad is there. We-- [yells] It doesn't matter!
translation.fr: - Mais mon père est là-bas. - Peu importe !

translation.en: Yes, it does! He could get killed because of us!
translation.fr: Il pourrait se faire tuer par notre faute.

translation.en: Just let me get you out of here first, all right?
It's my dad! We have to go back!
translation.fr: C'est mon père ! Il faut qu'on rentre !

translation.en: We'll figure a way to lead the tracker away somehow. I don't know. But we have to do something.
translation.fr: On le sèmera ensuite. Il faut essayer.

translation.en: Edward, I said leave me alone.
-Bella, don't do this, please. -It's over! Get out!
translation.fr: Ne fais pas ça. C'est fini. Va-t'en !

translation.en: Bella? What's going on?
I just gotta get out of here. I'm leaving. Now.
translation.fr: Il faut que je parte. Je m'en vais.

translation.en: What am I gonna say to him?
I can't hurt him.
-Bella, what's going on? -You just have to.
translation.fr: - Que se passe-t-il ? - Tu n'as pas le choix.

translation.en: I'll be down at the truck.
Did he hurt you?
Break up with you or something?
No, I broke up with him.
I thought you liked him.
Yeah, that's why I have to leave. I don't want this. I have to go home.
translation.fr: Oui, justement. C'est pour ça que je dois rentrer à la maison.

translation.en: Home? Your...
Your mom's not even in Phoenix.
translation.fr: Ta mère n'est même pas à Phoenix.

translation.en: [Bella] She'll come home. I'll call her from the road.
You're not gonna drive home right now.
translation.fr: Ne prends pas le volant. La nuit porte conseil.

translation.en: You can sleep on it. If you still feel like going in the morning,
translation.fr: Ne prends pas le volant. La nuit porte conseil. Demain, si tu veux, je t'emmènerai à l'aéroport.

translation.en: I'll take you to the airport.
translation.fr: Demain, si tu veux, je t'emmènerai à l'aéroport.

translation.en: No. I want to drive. It'll give me more time to think.
I mean, if I get really tired, I'll pull into a motel. I promise.
translation.fr: Si je suis fatiguée, je m'arrêterai dans un motel.

translation.en: Look, Bella, I know I'm not that much fun to be around,
translation.fr: Écoute, je sais que je ne suis pas de bonne compagnie,

translation.en: but I can change that.
We can do more stuff together.
Like what? Like watch baseball on the flat-screen?
translation.fr: Quoi ? Regarder du base-ball sur l'écran plat ?

translation.en: Eat at the diner every night? Steak and cobbler?
translation.fr: Manger du steak et du crumble au resto ?

translation.en: Dad, that's you. That's not me.
Bella, come on, I just...
[voice breaking] I just got you back.
Yeah, and, you know, if I don't get out now,
then I'm just gonna be stuck here like Mom.
Your father's gonna forgive you.
Why don't you let me drive?
He won't.
You should've seen his face.
I told him the same thing that my mom told him when she was leaving him.
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit ce que ma mère a dit en le quittant.

translation.en: It's the only way he'd let you go.
Just don't worry about him now. He's safe. The tracker's following us.
translation.fr: Oublie-le. Il ne risque rien. Le traqueur nous poursuit.

translation.en: -Oh, God. -It's just Emmett.
translation.fr: - C'est seulement Emmett. - Oh mon Dieu !

translation.en: Alice is in the car behind us.
[Carlisle] Wait.
He came to warn us about James.
translation.fr: Il vient nous alerter, pour James.

translation.en: This isn't my fight, and I've grown tired of his games,
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas mon combat. J'en ai assez de ses jeux.

translation.en: but he's got unparalleled senses, absolutely lethal.
translation.fr: Ses sens sont incomparables, et mortels.

translation.en: I've never seen anything like him in my 300 years.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien vu de tel en 300 ans d'existence.

translation.en: And the woman, Victoria, don't underestimate her.
translation.fr: Et la femelle, Victoria, ne la sous-estimez pas.

translation.en: I've had to fight our kind before. We're not easy to kill.
[Emmett] But not impossible.
We'll tear them apart and burn the pieces.
translation.fr: Il faut le dépecer et le brûler.

translation.en: I don't relish the thought of killing another creature,
translation.fr: Je ne me réjouis pas de tuer,

translation.en: even a sadistic one like James.
What if he kills one of us first?
translation.fr: Et s'il tuait l'un des nôtres d'abord ?

translation.en: I'm gonna run Bella south. Can you lead the tracker away from here?
translation.fr: J'emmène Bella au sud. Vous éloignerez le traqueur ?

translation.en: No, Edward. James knows you would never leave Bella.
translation.fr: Il sait que tu resteras avec Bella. Il te suivra.

translation.en: -He'll follow you. -[Alice] I'll go with Bella.
translation.fr: Il sait que tu resteras avec Bella. Il te suivra. J'emmènerai Bella au sud, avec Jasper.

translation.en: Jasper and I will drive her south.
translation.fr: J'emmènerai Bella au sud, avec Jasper.

translation.en: I'll keep her safe, Edward.
Can you keep your thoughts to yourself?
could you put these on so the tracker will pick up Bella's scent?
translation.fr: Mettez ça pour que le traqueur capte l'odeur de Bella.

translation.en: Why? What is she to me?
Rosalie, Bella is with Edward. She's part of this family now.
translation.fr: Bella est avec Edward. Elle est de la famille,

translation.en: And we protect our family.
Oh, God. If anything... What if...
translation.fr: Mon Dieu ! S'il arrive quoi que ce soit,

translation.en: If anything happens, I swear to God...
Nothing's gonna happen.
There's seven of us, and there's two of them,
and when everything's done, I'm gonna come back and get you.
translation.fr: Quand tout sera fini, je reviendrai te chercher.

translation.en: Bella, you are my life now.
Hey, Mom. It's me again.
You must have let your phone die or something.
I'm not in Forks, but everything's okay, and I'll explain it later.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas à Forks, mais ça va. Je t'expliquerai.

translation.en: [Edward] Rosalie, mark the tree.
That's good.
What is it? What do you see?
He's figured it out.
The tracker, he just changed course.
translation.fr: Le traqueur... a changé de cap.

translation.en: -Where will it take him, Alice? -Mirrors.
A room full of mirrors.
Edward said the visions weren't always certain.
translation.fr: Edward se méfie de ces visions.

translation.en: [Jasper] She sees the course people are on while they're on it.
translation.fr: Elle voit les gens se déplacer.

translation.en: If they change their minds, the vision changes.
translation.fr: S'ils changent d'avis, sa vision change.

translation.en: Okay, so the course that the tracker's on now is gonna lead him to a ballet studio?
translation.fr: Alors, la route du traqueur le mène à un studio de danse ?

translation.en: -You've been here? -I took lessons as a kid.
translation.fr: - Tu y es allée ? - Quand j'étais petite.

translation.en: The school I went to had an arch just like that. Was your school here in Phoenix?
translation.fr: - L'école avait une arche identique. - C'était ici, à Phoenix ?

translation.en: -Edward, are you okay? -We've lost the tracker.
translation.fr: - Ça va ? - On a perdu le traqueur.

translation.en: The woman's still in the area.
Rosalie and Esme are going back to Forks to protect your father.
translation.fr: Rosalie et Esmé retournent à Forks protéger ton père.

translation.en: I'm coming to get you. Then you and I are gonna go somewhere alone.
translation.fr: Je viens te chercher. Nous irons quelque part... seuls.

translation.en: And the others will keep hunting.
I'll do whatever it takes to make you safe again.
translation.fr: Je ferai tout pour te protéger.

translation.en: Hey, Mom, I'm glad you got my message. What are you doing home?
translation.fr: Maman ! Tu as eu mon message. Tu es à la maison ?

translation.en: [Renee] Bella? Bella? Bella, where are you?
-Calm down, everything's fine. -Bella? Bella?
-I'll explain everything later... -[rustling]
Mom, are you there?
[James] Forks High School doesn't protect its students' privacy very well.
translation.fr: Le lycée protège mal la vie privée des élèves.

translation.en: It was just too easy for Victoria to find your previous address.
translation.fr: C'était un jeu d'enfant pour Victoria de trouver ta précédente adresse.

translation.en: It's a nice house you have here.
I was prepared to wait for you,
translation.fr: J'allais t'attendre, mais maman est rentrée

translation.en: but then Mom came home after she received a very worried call from your dad,
translation.fr: J'allais t'attendre, mais maman est rentrée après l'appel angoissé de ton papa.

translation.en: and it all worked out quite well.
-Mm. -[Renee] Wait, wait... Don't touch her! Don't...
-You can still save her. -[Bella] Don't!
But you're gonna have to get away from your friends.
translation.fr: Mais il faudra quitter tes amis.

translation.en: Can you handle that?
Where should I meet you?
How about your old ballet studio?
And I'll know if you bring anyone along.
translation.fr: Je le saurai, si tu n'es pas seule.

translation.en: Poor Mommy would pay the price for that mistake.
translation.fr: Ta pauvre maman le paierait cher.

translation.en: [Bella] I'd never given much thought to how I would die.
translation.fr: Je m'étais rarement demandé comment je mourrais,

translation.en: But dying in the place of someone I love seems like a good way to go.
translation.fr: mais mourir à la place d'un être cher semble une fin enviable.

translation.en: I can't bring myself to regret the decisions that brought me face-to-face with death.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive donc pas à regretter ce qui m'a amenée face à la mort.

translation.en: They also brought me to Edward.
[Renee] Bella? Bella? Bella, where are you?
-Mom? -Bella?
-Mom? -There you are. What are you doing in here?
translation.fr: Te voilà. Qu'est-ce que tu fais là ?

translation.en: [young Bella] Everyone makes fun of me.
translation.fr: Ils se moquent tous de moi.

translation.en: [Renee] Come on, you're a wonderful dancer.
Mom, I suck.
[Renee] You do not suck.
That's my favorite part.
You were a stubborn child, weren't you?
translation.fr: Quelle tête de mule tu étais.

translation.en: -She's not even here. -No.
[James] Sorry.
You know, but you really made it too easy.
translation.fr: Tu m'as trop facilité les choses.

translation.en: So, to make things more entertaining,
translation.fr: Alors, pour les rendre plus divertissantes,

translation.en: I'm gonna make a little film of our time together.
translation.fr: je vais faire un petit film de notre rencontre.

translation.en: I borrowed this from your house. I hope you don't mind.
translation.fr: J'ai emprunté ça chez toi. Tu m'en veux pas ?

translation.en: Good.
And... action.
Oh. That'll break Edward's little heart.
You have... Edward has nothing to do with this!
translation.fr: - Edward n'a rien à voir avec ça ! - Mais si.

translation.en: Oh, his rage will make for more interesting sport
than his feeble attempt to protect you.
translation.fr: ses faibles efforts pour te protéger.

translation.en: And let's continue.
Beautiful. Very visually dynamic.
I chose my stage well.
It's too bad he didn't have the strength to turn you.
translation.fr: Dommage qu'il n'ait pas eu la force de te changer.

translation.en: Instead, he kept you this fragile little human.
translation.fr: Tu es restée une fragile humaine.

translation.en: It's cruel, really.
Tell Edward how much it hurts.
Tell him to avenge you. Tell him!
No, Edward, don't! Tell him! Tell him!
You're alone 'cause you're faster than the others.
translation.fr: Tu es seul parce que tu es plus rapide.

translation.en: But not stronger.
I'm strong enough to kill you.
I'm sorry.
-Bella, Bella, it's okay. -Son.
Remember who you are.
[Alice] Bella, you're okay. [Carlisle] Bella needs you.
translation.fr: - Ça va aller. - Bella a besoin de toi.

translation.en: It's okay. Oh, God.
translation.fr: Ça va aller. Oh mon Dieu !

translation.en: Carlisle? Her blood.
-[Carlisle] Your brothers will take care of him. -I got him.
translation.fr: - Tes frères s'occuperont de lui. - Je le tiens.

translation.en: -[Alice] Carlisle! -Start the fire. [Emmett] Get the floorboards.
Alice, go.
Her femoral artery's been severed. She's losing too much blood.
translation.fr: L'artère fémorale est coupée. Elle saigne trop.

translation.en: No, no, my head is burning!
It's the venom.
You have to make a choice. You could let the change happen.
It's gonna happen, Edward. I've seen it.
translation.fr: Elle va muter, je l'ai vu.

translation.en: It doesn't have to be that way.
She's still hemorrhaging. Alice, make me a tourniquet. Your belt.
translation.fr: Fais un garrot avec ta ceinture.

translation.en: Carlisle, what's my other option?
Tie it above my hands.
Go.
We could try to suck the venom out. You know I won't be able to stop.
translation.fr: - Aspire le venin. - Je ne pourrai pas m'arrêter.

translation.en: Then find the will to stop.
But choose. She only has minutes left.
translation.fr: Choisis. Elle n'a que quelques minutes.

translation.en: I'm gonna make it go away, Bella.
I'm gonna make it go away.
Edward, stop. Her blood is clean. You're killing her.
translation.fr: Arrête. Son sang est pur, tu vas la tuer.

translation.en: Stop.
Find the will.
[Bella] Death is peaceful, easy.
Life is harder.
-Mom? -Hey.
Where is he?
Where's Edward?
He's asleep.
He never leaves.
And your dad, he's down at the cafeteria.
translation.fr: Ton père est à la cafétéria.

translation.en: What happened?
Well, when you fell, you broke your leg,
translation.fr: Tu t'es cassé la jambe en tombant.

translation.en: and you lost a lot of blood.
translation.fr: Tu as perdu beaucoup de sang.

translation.en: You don't remember any of this, do you?
translation.fr: Tu ne te souviens de rien ?

translation.en: Edward came down with his dad
translation.fr: Edward est venu avec son père.

translation.en: to try to convince you to come back to Forks.
translation.fr: Ils voulaient te faire revenir à Forks.

translation.en: So you went over to their hotel, then you tripped,
translation.fr: Tu es allée à leur hôtel, et tu es tombée.

translation.en: and you fell down two flights of stairs.
Went through a window!
Yeah, that sounds like me.
Oh, honey, I'm so sorry.
It's Phil.
He's so worried about you.
You're texting.
I told him to stay down in Florida.
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit de rester en Floride.

translation.en: Honey, you are gonna love Jacksonville. It's sunny every day,
translation.fr: Tu vas adorer Jacksonville. C'est si ensoleillé.

translation.en: and we found the cutest little house, and you've got your own bathroom--
translation.fr: La maison est adorable, tu auras ta salle de bains.

translation.en: Mom, I still want to live in Forks.
translation.fr: Je veux quand même rester à Forks.

translation.en: What?
I want to live in Forks.
Well, okay, we'll talk about it.
Do you mind getting Dad?
I have to talk to him. Apologize.
Okay, baby. I'll go get him.
And I'll go get a nurse, okay?
So what happened?
Where's James?
We took care of it.
And the woman, Victoria, she ran off.
I'm alive because of you.
translation.fr: Je suis en vie grâce à toi.

translation.en: No, you're in here because of me.
translation.fr: Non, tu es ici par ma faute.

translation.en: The worst part of it was that...
I thought I wasn't gonna be able to stop.
translation.fr: j'ai cru ne pas pouvoir m'arrêter.

translation.en: You did stop.
Bella, you gotta go to Jacksonville so I can't hurt you anymore.
translation.fr: Tu dois aller à Jacksonville, pour te protéger de moi.

translation.en: What?
[stuttering] I don't even know what you're... How...
What are you talking about? You want me to go away? I can't...
translation.fr: Tu veux que je m'en aille ?

translation.en: No, I can't... I can't just leave you... I know.
translation.fr: - Je ne peux pas te quitter ! - Je sais.

translation.en: We can't be apart. You can't leave me.
translation.fr: Ne nous séparons pas, ne m'abandonne pas.

translation.en: I'm here.
Okay, just don't...
translation.fr: D'accord. Mais ne me dis pas de choses pareilles.

translation.en: You just can't say stuff like that to me. Ever.
translation.fr: D'accord. Mais ne me dis pas de choses pareilles. Jamais.

translation.en: Where else am I gonna go?
Alice lent me the dress.
The cast is...
You're perfect.
I'll take care of her, Chief Swan.
Uh-huh. I've heard that before.
I put a new can of pepper spray in your bag.
translation.fr: J'ai mis un spray neuf dans ton sac.

translation.en: Dad.
Well, you look beautiful.
Thanks.
See you.
Hey. I'll be right back.
Nice.
You, too.
Are you crashing the prom or something? Did you come with a date?
My dad paid me to come talk to you.
translation.fr: Mon père m'a payé pour te parler.

translation.en: Twenty bucks.
Let's hear it.
Just don't get mad, okay?
He wants you to break up with your boyfriend.
translation.fr: Il veut que tu rompes avec ton petit ami.

translation.en: It's just, he said, quote,
translation.fr: Et... il a dit, je cite : On t'aura à l'œil.

translation.en: "We'll be watching you."
translation.fr: je cite : On t'aura à l'œil.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Okay, well, tell him, "Thanks."
-And to pay up. -Okay. Let me help you.
translation.fr: - Et dis-lui de payer. - Je vais t'aider.

translation.en: I'll take it from here.
Guess I'll see you around, Bella.
I leave you alone for two minutes, and the wolves descend.
translation.fr: Je te laisse deux minutes et les loups rappliquent.

translation.en: I can't believe you're making me do this. Just smile.
translation.fr: - Ce que tu me fais faire ! - Souris.

translation.en: Wow. You are really trying to kill me.
The prom is an important rite of passage. I didn't want you to miss anything.
translation.fr: Le bal est un rite de passage. Fallait pas que tu rates ça.

translation.en: -Do you want to go? -Yeah.
[Eric] All right, slowing it down.
Shall we?
You're serious?
Oh, why not?
See, you're dancing.
At prom.
Edward, why did you save me?
If you just let the venom spread,
translation.fr: Tu aurais laissé agir le venin,

translation.en: I could be like you by now.
You don't know what you're saying.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas ce que tu dis.

translation.en: -You don't want this. -I want you. Always.
translation.fr: - Tu ne veux pas ça. - C'est toi que je veux. Toujours.

translation.en: I'm not gonna end your life for you.
I'm dying already.
Every second, I get closer.
Older.
That's the way it's supposed to be.
Alice said that she saw me like you.
translation.fr: Alice dit m'avoir vue comme toi.

translation.en: -I heard her. -Her visions change.
Yeah, based on what people decide.
translation.fr: D'après ce que les gens décident.

translation.en: I've decided.
So that's what you dream about.
Becoming a monster.
I dream about being with you forever.
translation.fr: Je rêve d'être à jamais à tes côtés.

translation.en: Forever?
And you're ready right now?
Is it not enough just to have a long and happy life with me?
translation.fr: Ça ne te suffit pas d'avoir une vie longue et heureuse avec moi ?

translation.en: For now.
[Bella] No one will surrender tonight,
translation.fr: Personne ne rendra les armes ce soir,

translation.en: but I won't give in.
I know what I want.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que je veux.
